meanings: be dazed, be stunned, be blank

vlive.korean: 네 말을 들은 내가 얼빠진 놈이지. I knew I shouldn't have listened to you. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : 마스크 06화 – 유효기간 5
vlive.english: I knew I shouldn't have listened to you.

vlive.korean: 요새 너 얼빠져있는 거 알아? Did you know you're totally out of it these days? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네 옆에는 늘 내가 있을래 [연애미수] EP10
vlive.english: Did you know you're totally out of it these days?

examples.korean: His vague manner concealed a brilliant mind. 발음듣기 그의 얼빠진 것 같은 태도는 그의 뛰어난 지성을 감추고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His vague manner concealed a brilliant mind. 발음

examples.korean: a fatuous comment / grin 발음듣기 어리석은 말/얼빠진 웃음 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He mumbled as if he had lost his mind. 발음듣기 그는 얼빠진 사람처럼 중얼거렸다 Neungyule
examples.english: He mumbled as if he had lost his mind. 발음

examples.korean: Enough with the nonsense! 발음듣기 얼빠진 소리 좀 그만 해라! Neungyule
I really blew it.《미·속》 발음듣기 나는 정말 얼빠진 짓을 했다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
